projects.title: QR Code Scanner Inventory Manager
projects.description: An inventory management system utilising a QR code reader and generator. The frontend was built with Svelte and the backend utilises .NET and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Websocket JavaFX Chatroom Application
projects.description: A Java chatroom application utilising websockets and asymmetric client-server encryption.

projects.title: [Interactive] Spider Typer Game
projects.description: A speed typing game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Final version utilises a PHP and mySQL backend to graph user progress.

projects.title: Fractal Trees
projects.description: L-System fractal tree generator which allow users to input values. Built for an assignment to compare coding with Python and Haskell.

projects.title: [Interactive] Happy Mrs Chicken Clicker Game
projects.description: An idle click game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: Autodesk Maya Grass Generator Plugin
projects.description: A Python plugin for generating grass in Autodesk Maya. Allows users to customize grass length, density, and placement on selected surfaces.
